description: On this site, I’ve avoided putting emoticons that take up more than one line of actual text as these start to wander into ascii art territory. That isn’t really what this site is about. However, I quite like this one. I’ve seen a lot of Japanese kaomoji experts on Twitter tweet about it more than once so I’m going to allow this one. ╲T Fªˡˢᵉͧͬ✍
title: Multiple Lines
